entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
